nodes.text: Doctor Aphra 15 is the fifteenth issue of the canon comic book series Star Wars: Doctor Aphra. The issue was written by Kieron Gillen and Si Spurrier, illustrated by Emilio Laiso, and published on December 20, 2017 by Marvel Comics. The issue contains the story "Remastered Part II," in which Doctor Aphra leads a team on a mission for Triple-Zero.
Rogue archaeologist Doctor Aphra may be in over her head…but at least she's not alone! Er…let's hope they're friendly!
